name: Un-Rooted
description:
Ever brought a plant to the office to cheer the whole place up?

Well, if you have, you know how 'bringing a plant to the office' ties in with 'delay the inevitable'!

Jump right into the action in Un-Rooted; the game where you try to keep your precious office plant alive for as long as possible while all your colleagues just HAVE to touch the thing. (And knowing them, they WILL knock it over. I'm looking at you, Steve from HR.)

But while you keep these pesky colleagues away (by body-bludgeoning them of course, how else?) you still have to keep your plant alive and happy* by giving it water!

*plant does not care about being in its pot, as long as it has water and it's not on the floor** it's dandy.

**tables, the printer, and dead bodies*** of colleagues are fine

***dead bodies may or may not (read: will) explode after a certain amount of time.

Controls:

      WASD/arrow keys => move,

      Bump into colleagues => immobilize them

      Touch watering can => pick up watering can

   Water can:

      Hold left click => water

      Hold right click near source => fill watering can

   Shortcuts:

      M/ESC => return to menu/character select

      R => restart level
